title: 1.7 Changes
description:
Does anyone know how we're going to separate the pre 1.7 with post? I don't see a good way,, rather than changing the pre to have *outdated* in the title and linking them to in the new page full of 1.7 info, where we say "use this if you are playing pre 1.7".

Anyone got any other ideas?

replies.body: Start with just a page called 1.7. Get stuff down, and refine it until release. Then we can work on transitioning the wiki to something better.

Copy over the 1.6 page to the 1.7 pages and rewrite changes.
Default pages will be 1.7, with a link to legacy pages of 1.6
Transitioning should only be started after a full stable release of Gregs and once we have at least some changelog to write the pages.
